QuestData.Title: Crushing the Wildhammer
QuestData.Description: Since my people first claimed the Highlands, the Wildhammer dwarves have been our persistent foe. We fought them in Grim Batol, we fought them in the Wetlands, and even now open warfare rages to our north, across the river, amidst the Thundermar Ruins.$B$BProve your valor to me. Seek out and crush Wildhammer Warbrands. The best among them carry insignias - my warriors collect them by the dozen.$B$BCan you?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Wildhammer Warbrands to collect 8 Wildhammer Insignias. Named characters within the Thundermar Ruins will also carry insignias.
QuestData.CompletionText: Show me the insignias you've collected, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: <Narkrall clenches the insignias in his weathered hand.>$B$BSo, $c. There's more to you than meets the eye.$B$BMaybe your Horde can stand with the best of my warriors. Let's try you out...
